name: chat-backend
description: Chat em tempo real - Backend com Clean Architecture

scripts.test:api: echo '🧪 Testando API endpoints...' && curl -s http://localhost:3001/api/users | jq length
scripts.test:health: echo '🧪 Testando health check...' && curl -f http://localhost:3001/health || echo '❌ Health check falhou'
scripts.test:full: echo '🧪 TESTE COMPLETO DO BACKEND' && yarn test:health && yarn test:api && echo '✅ Backend OK'
scripts.test:load: echo '🧪 Teste de carga...' && for i in {1..10}; do curl -s http://localhost:3001/health > /dev/null & done && wait && echo '✅ Teste de carga concluído'
scripts.test:security: echo '🧪 Testando headers de segurança...' && curl -I http://localhost:3001/ | grep -E '(X-Frame-Options|X-Content-Type-Options)' || echo '❌ Headers de segurança não encontrados'
